flawed_nl_solution:
The medical cost comes out to 45*10+250=$<<45*10+250=700>>700
Insurance covers 700*0.8=$<<700*0.8=560>>560
So he has to pay 700-560=$<<700-560=140>>140
Added to the cost of the trip he has to pay 1200+140=$<<1200+140=1430>>1430
#### 1430

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1340, not 1430. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
